website_summaries.verdict: Clipper that stands out for a unique design and being best for older babies.
pros: Caregivers appreciate the distinctive design that offers a good grip and sturdy feel
Helps keep hands steady while clipping
Gets top marks for being well made
This design may work best for older babies

customer_reviews.title: Tried many baby nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: This was the best out of several that I tried. Summer Infants with flashlight was very bulky and hard to use, Summer Infant without flashlight (part of 1st aid kit) broke after a few uses. Frida baby nail clippers makes baby's nail fray and hard to make smooth ends (makes baby's nails jagged) & the curved end makes it so you can't clip nails front all directions. This nail clipper is relatively easy to hold & use. It hasn't broken yet after a few months of use
customer_reviews.author: Karen T

customer_reviews.title: Ideal toddler size
customer_reviews.text: Sooo much better than my old metal nail clippers! My 15 month old is getting too squirmy and hates getting his nails clipped. My old ones were so small and slippery that I'd finally get him to stay still and then they would slip so I'd jump back to avoid getting his fingers. These are sharp, so only one try clips the nail easily. Perfect size, and so easy to hold! No slip!! They seem like decent quality, but honestly I'd be willing to but a new one every few weeks to keep his little hands safe. I feel so much more comfortable now!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easier to use than I thought and I don't feel like I would cut my baby by accident which was what I feared most. I do have small-ish hands though so it may be harder to manage it for those with bigger hands. Edit to add: We have had this for not even 9 months and today when I pinched it to start cutting the lil one's nails, the spring snapped and flew across the room. I have yet to find it. Thank goodness she is not one to put everything in her mouth but it sure can be a choking hazard! The whole thing came apart. I'm the trash it goes...
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: Clipping your infants nails for the first time is a little intimidating. The rubber grip on these helps you feel confident that your grip won't slip. Just used them for the first time and was glad i'd purchased these. (if it helps any other new parent out there - i trimmed his nails on one hand when he dozed off during nursing - did the other hand when he dozed off on the other breast - you have a much better chance of his hand not moving if they're sleeping!) I also have very small hands, so this very small size is great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Biscuit MomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: CUTE, but not effective for newborn nails
customer_reviews.text: This is what I get for buying something because it's "cute"! These appear to be good quality and are definitely cute - but just not super functional. A few other reviewers mentioned that it was tough to get a good hold on them because they are so small, and they were right! These are not easy to use, especially on a squirmy newborn. They also did relatively nothing to trim down the newborn paper-like long nails...not matter what angle I tried, they would NOT clip anything. These may work ok for older babies, but wish I had gone with the nail scissors for my needs instead of purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pair of baby nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: These are the second pair of these clippers that we own. When the first pair went missing, then were found, I knew I needed another for the next time that happened. Clipping baby nails is terrifying for this first-time-mom, but these have worked the best for me, personally. They are easy to hold and make the job go quickly, which is important with a wiggly baby.
customer_reviews.author: Cobramonkey

customer_reviews.title: Great product - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Good, functional design. Easy to use, not slippery like regular nail clippers. I own two and have bought it as a gift for friends with babies as well. With my first, I started using these clippers when my son was around 6 months and I still use them 2 years later (for hands and toes). Today, I actually used them on my 5wk old baby while he was sleeping and was so pleased with the result, I searched my old amazon orders just to write this review and give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Hipster Baby Clippers
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the nail clippers that came in a baby set we received at the baby shower. Those work fine, but the rubber is peeling off after a year of use. The Rhoost clipper showed up on a suggested search and I was immediately drawn to the look. These are the hipster style baby clippers. I decided to buy one for us and one for a baby shower gift. I love how sturdy they feel. The wood base helps keep my fingers steady and these clippers don't slip out of my grasp like our cheap clippers. I'll be buying these as a baby shower gift from here on.
customer_reviews.author: Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: They work great for a squirmy 9 month old, 3 year old, even better than the basic safety first baby clippers. They feel great in your hand while trimming baby nails. Would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why Amazon recommended this to me. It is a waste of money. It is wayyy too small, when what you need is something big with better grip when you are trying to clip your squirmy infant/toddler's nails. This one just annoyed me for a couple of weeks until I accepted defeat and bought some functional ones. Don't waste you money on this.
customer_reviews.author: calico27

customer_reviews.title: Best around for kids past infancy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and our daughter thinks they're fun with the round shape and bright colors! They are too big for a newborn (despite being used to wrangling my squirmy daughter to use them from about 18 mos, I accidentally cut my placid newborn son with them because they're just too big for now 😢). But when your child is big enough, these are the best!
customer_reviews.author: jab

customer_reviews.title: Magical clippers
customer_reviews.text: I buy a pair of these for every pregnant woman I know. It seems like the chore of baby nail cutting is dreaded with other clippers, but these are brilliant. They’re easy to hold and maneuver, sharp enough to cut the nail, quick and easy
customer_reviews.author: Nicolet Webber

customer_reviews.title: No frills and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted these at my baby shower and ordered another set when my toddler misplaced them. These are great, no frills baby nail clippers. They make a clean cut, unlike the Safety First brand ones I tried initially after losing my first set. The silicone provides a grip you can trust and the shape feels secure in the hand. Simple, but well designed product. I’ll definitely order again if (let’s be honest, when) my toddler loses this set, too!
customer_reviews.author: saud

customer_reviews.title: Do you love filth and broken things?!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a condition that could only be explained by it having been kicked from the Chinese factory where it was made all the way to the Amazon warehouse that sent it to me. When my husband opened the filthy box, the bamboo piece fell to the ground so he threw it away. So now we are stuck with comically small, hard to maneuver nail clippers with a dirty silicone ball on top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST BABY NAIL CLIPPERS OUT THERE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well crafted baby and children's grooming tool!! Love the large round handles, they make it much easier to grasp such tiny clippers. Plus the top has a silicone cover for a better grip. I've used standard metal versions and they slip right out of my hand and they do not clip as clean or as smooth as the Rhoost. These are a blessing and you should add them to your baby grooming kit straight away. It would be a waste of money to buy anything else!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna-nah

customer_reviews.title: Great baby clippers!
customer_reviews.text: These baby nail clippers are awesome. I've accidentally knicked my baby a few times with my other pair and its devastating each time. The handle on these helps keep my hand more steady! They are nice and sharp too. Love them. Every parent needs one.
customer_reviews.author: jwebb19

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers
customer_reviews.text: Love these baby nail clippers. My daughter was born with long nails and we have had to cut them quite a few times in just two short months. They cut well and precisely, which is very important while cutting newborn nails. I love the design of these and would recommend to other parents.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Ciraulo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love this nail clip for the baby bit is easy to hold and does a great job of one clip if positioned correctly. No accidents so far. It is very sharp compared to others we tried.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. They fit perfectly in you hand for ease of use. Color was perfect for my best friend who loves light teal. Also a plus is the "green" look for eco friendly/crunchy moms.
customer_reviews.author: Kashemere

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and control are worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They are sort of silly looking, but truly are very comfortable to hold. The grip makes for 100% control. All this means efficiency, and ease. Two things any mom trying to trim a squirmy toddler needs. Also, the control takes the stress out of trimming tiny newborn nails. They are more expensive than some other brands, and worth every extra penny!
customer_reviews.author: Whimsical

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Tool
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for baby's tiny nails but the little silicone bulb makes it easy for adult hands to use. Note that it likely won't work for newborn nails, which are usually paper thin - they only work once baby's nails have hardened. (I used Tweezerman nose hair scissors with rounded tips until then.)
customer_reviews.author: AKL

customer_reviews.title: Love these nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: Love these nail clippers. I had previously tried a different brand/style of nail clippers, but they were awkward to hold and made it difficult to clip my baby's nails. These clippers are so easy to grasp and maneuver, I've had no problems clipping my little one's tiny nails!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works great on little baby nails
customer_reviews.text: I have not had any success with a file for my baby, so I bought this mini nail clipper - small and easy to use! I actually bought 2...one to keep in my diaper bag and one at home. Now that she's older and more fidgety, it's gotten a bit harder, but for me the clipper is still the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Nice grip!
customer_reviews.text: Great mail clipper! It feels very well made and sturdy. The blade is sharp. It fits nicely in my hand and provides great grip when trying to handle squirmy little hands. My only complaint is that the rubber on the lever already had some scuff marks and divets. But that is a very minor problem. I would definitely recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: docgrl

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it, but it came apart for no reason ...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love it, but it came apart for no reason during regular use. And I couldn't manage to put it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana T.

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and wood look and even better they ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and wood look and even better they work great on my newborn baby. A must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Tally-ho

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great nail clipper especially for clipping a toddlers nails.
customer_reviews.author: CVino

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy love the design and how it fits in my hand. Way less slippery than other baby clippers. Also love that its wooden.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Clipper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my grandbaby's nails. Her mommy is very pleased Grandma found it and read about it and purchased it from Amazon! Now mommy uses it when clipping and I am a happy baby!
customer_reviews.author: PESO

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these clippers! Easiest to hold and not slip while your trying to clip babies tiny fingernails and really cute too! I’m going to get another one because I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Great clipper
customer_reviews.text: Nice little clipper! Works well, seems safe and secure for tiny fingers
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't stick out to you like nail clippers whenever you leave them sitting out
customer_reviews.text: Cute and small! These are probably one of the easiest pairs I've used for babies thanks to the larger areas to grip. It doesn't stick out to you like nail clippers whenever you leave them sitting out.
customer_reviews.author: Roxann

customer_reviews.title: Seemed nice. Dog ate them so can't say they held ...
customer_reviews.text: Used once. Seemed nice. Dog ate them so can't say they held up real well. Gotta find dog proof clippers.
customer_reviews.author: jah

customer_reviews.title: Best baby nail clipper
customer_reviews.text: My favorite nail clipper, easy to hold in your hand. Find this easier to use than the Summer Infant brand
customer_reviews.author: Annick Hart

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: love this eco friendly nail clipper. easy to hold and use.
customer_reviews.author: damaris m.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt come in a covered package
customer_reviews.text: So the blue color just looks really dirty.. baby isnt here for 3 more months so i havent actually tried them to see how well they work. Was liking the style and if it didnt look like it rolled around on a warehouse floor itd look nice.
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy to use compared to other baby nail clippers out ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to use compared to other baby nail clippers out there. It's the perfect size for my little guy's nails and allows me to see what I'm doing so I don't slip and hurt him. I buy these for all the new moms I know because I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids, safe and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: After a bad experience with other nail clippers with my first baby (I cut her tiny finger!) I left nail clipping duty to my husband. We got these when our third was born and they are the best! Perfectly sharp, the exact size necessary for little fingers, make it easy to see what you're doing, and I'm no longer worried about hurting tiny fingers, not even on my newborn.
customer_reviews.author: LdlV

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy too use, and now that my kid is a toddler & wants to start clipping his own nails these are perfect because he can hold and control them easily. Love that they are wood. Highly recommend over other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this nail clipper it’s the only one I feel comfortable using on my 16 month old, and the grip is great!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Fav EVER
customer_reviews.text: These are the best for new baby nails, I have them everywhere at the house!
customer_reviews.author: KDS

customer_reviews.title: BABY SHOWER GIFT
customer_reviews.text: It was a baby shower gift for someone who put it on her registry.
customer_reviews.author: Lunahartz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Easy to use. Easy to hold. Perfectly sized. Very cute. All around, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for cutting tiny baby nails
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for cutting tiny baby nails. I have only used them twice on my now 4 week old baby but both times I felt confident I would t cut her fingers
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: but it is so easy to hold and keep a grip
customer_reviews.text: They are big enough to not get lost in a drawer but small enough for little fingers. The shape made me nervous when I ordered it, but it is so easy to hold and keep a grip. I bought one for each of my children!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, hate the daily emails!
customer_reviews.text: This clippers themselves are perfect. I love them. Well made, great size, fit perfectly and are very comfortable in my hand and product alone deserves 5 stars. So why only 2 stars??? I received numourous emails from Rhoost basically begging for a review. 1 email is a big turn off for me to review in the first place, but 4 in the last week and they started coming once a day! While I love this product in fact I have 2 the amount of harassing emails after purchasing is enough to turn me off from purchasing from this company again. If you don't like tons of emails begging for reviews don't order these.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Tiny Clippers!
customer_reviews.text: I love this nail clipper! It is smaller than most baby clippers so it's perfect for their tiny fingers! I've never mistakenly clipped my baby's fingers! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good clippers but better for toddlers. I keep clipping my baby's finger
customer_reviews.author: Crunchyveganmom

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Was easier to use than I had expected - loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Haire

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite baby clippers
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite baby nail clippers. I feel most in control using these clippers and can get a nice clean, close cut with them. And they're very cute!
customer_reviews.author: madelaine

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!! Dirty, and rusted!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with what I recieved.. They looked used. There were black marks all over the green area, and inside where you will place the babies nail to cut was all rusted and black!! I was so excited to order these and when I got them today. I was not happy at all.. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High end look but totally nonfunctional
customer_reviews.text: The clippers don't fully close, so they are not able to cut my baby's nails at all. The blue part of the product was also scuffed and dirty looking when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: LellyBilly

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Who knew nail clippers could be cute! I’ve used the basic baby nail clippers before on cutting my baby’s nail and this is so much better compared to the regular ones because of its shape and material makes it easy for my fingers NOT to slip while trying to cut the baby’s nails. It was a good buy definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: The Kissel’s

product_meta.title: Rhoost Deluxe Baby Nail Clipper- Easy to Use Ergonomic Design with Natural Bamboo & No Slip Silicone Thumb Rest. Ideal for Infants & Toddlers
feature_bullets: SAFE & GENTLE FOR BABY - Baby safety is our #1 priority. Our no slip grip feature means that the clippers are easy to use and stay securely in your hand. The vibrant pop of color distracts children during nail cutting making the process smoother and faster.

EXTRA LONG LASTING - We pride ourselves on the quality of our products. Our Nail Clippers are made from bamboo, one of nature’s strongest and most durable elements giving you maximum value. Trust our Nail Clippers to go the distance as your child grows from baby to toddler.

PERFECT GIFT FOR NEW MOMS - With Rhoost nail clippers you can rest at ease when cutting even the most delicate of nails. Keep it in your handbag or diaper bag to get maximum use on the go. The stylish design it makes an ideal maternity and baby shower gift idea.

PREMIUM QUALITY – Ergonomic and made from the finest natural bamboo. Features a no-slip thumb rest. Offering both style and functionality, we are committed to creating beautiful & innovative solutions that support parents and protect babies. Let us take the challenge out of cutting your baby’s nails and give you peace of mind.

specifications.Safety warning: Keep away from small children to avoid accidents.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
